tagline: I can help you achieve your goal as a web developer
about: Hi, my name is Usman Khan and I am a full-stack web developer with close to 3 years of experience in Asp.Net, Angular, and WordPress. I am proficient in working with APIs and debugging. I am also familiar with a variety of development tools and methodologies such as N-Layered Architecture, SOLID Principles, Unit of Work, and Repository Pattern.

experiences.description:
I am a seasonal web developer in Asp.Net, and Angular for close to two years. I have experience in building both front-end and back-end web applications using these technologies. During my time at perspective-v, I gained hands-on experience with Ag-Grid, Nx-Workspaces, Angular DataTables, Syncfusion, and more. I have worked on variety of projects, Including: 

 Learn Quran Live Academy (Asp.Net 6)
Flat Management System (Angular)
Gorsi Shop (Asp.Net Core 3.1)
Client Management Website (Angular + Asp.Net)

I am confident that I can use my skills to help you achieve your web development goals.

In my time at Gorsi Shop, I have created their E-Commerce website in Wordpress as well as in Asp.Net Core MVC, named Gorsi Shop. Once in Asp.net Core and the second iteration in WordPress. 
 Gorsi Shop is an e-commerce website that allows whole sellers to buy any IT related items such as keyboards, mouse, printers, projectors etc. And a complete admin panel is implemented for the admins of the site to manage products, orders and view reviews on different projects. 
 Tools: 
	1st Iteration: 
	• Front-end: Html, Css, jQuery 
	• Back-end: Asp.Net Core 2.0, Entity Framework Core 

 2nd Iteration: 
	• WordPress

Working as a freelancer in Asp.net, Angular, Angular Dart, and WordPress. Till now, I have worked on some of the projects listed below: 

 • My Life You Choose (Asp.Net MVC) 
 • AM-Brisbane-Psychology (Asp.Net Razor Pages) 
 • Ease My Sales (Angular) 
 • Pagric Web Application (Angular) 
 • Tipnet (Angular) 
 • Tamino Autograph (WordPress) 
 • Roofers Free Zone Co (WordPress)

testimonials.name: Ashpaddon
testimonials.review: The seller was very easy to work with and prompt with all requests. He went beyond what was asked of him. Thanks again. Look forward to working with you in the future.

testimonials.name: Netexchange
testimonials.review: Seller was very responsible and completed his task within the timeline given. Would highly recommend the Seller for a good WordPress development project.

testimonials.name: Netexchange
testimonials.review: Seller was polite, did more than required and has a lot of passion in what he does. This is the 2nd time I have engaged his Services.

testimonials.name: Nestorm750
testimonials.review: excellent, fast, very competent and knowledgeable, very polite - highly recommended.

testimonials.review: Awesome to work with. Great responsiveness and understanding of what was required. He provided me the best solutions and recommendations for my project.
